reviews.review_content: Thank God that she's gone to NIH, hopefully forever. She had a hardon for Columbia and anyone associated with the school in anyway. She was unapproachable, nasty and for a going away present, as a final exam, she gave a 4 question test where 2 of the 4 questions we on topics covered in the last 2 lectures, without any homework assigned to back up nor any review for the final. Yuuuuuuuuuuuuch!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
